item.title: Penetration Testing
item.description: We secure your applications and infrastructure by diving deep before the criminals do. Tests targets may include web applications, mobile applications, on-prem and cloud infrastructure and more

item.title: Attack Surface Management
item.description: Kovert offers continuous attack surface monitoring, where we can detect and alert you to the presence of threats to your digital operations.

item.title: Trainings
item.description: Taught directly by our team, we share our operational knowledge and lessons learned. We offer a range of scenarios designed to be applicable in day-to-day security operations.

item.title: Adversary Simulation
item.description: A service that allows you to simulate attacks on your systems.
